SELECT SEQ_PHOTO.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO PHOTO (PHOTO_NO, USER_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES (#{photoNo},#{userNo}, #{originName},#{changeName},#{filePath})
mapper.delete: DELETE PHOTO WHERE PHOTO_NO=(select PHOTO_NO from PHOTO join USER_PROFILE USING(PHOTO_NO) where USER_NO=#{userNo})
DELETE PHOTO WHERE PHOTO_NO=(select PHOTO_NO from PHOTO join FEED_PHOTO USING(PHOTO_NO) where FEED_NO=#{feedNo})
mapper.select: SELECT P.* FROM PHOTO P JOIN FEED_PHOTO USING (PHOTO_NO) WHERE FEED_NO=#{feedNo}
SELECT P.* FROM USER_PROFILE U LEFT JOIN PHOTO P ON(U.PHOTO_NO = P.PHOTO_NO) WHERE U.USER_NO=#{userNo}
SELECT P.* FROM PHOTO P WHERE PHOTO_NO=#{photoNo}
